column5: Hi Everyone,  It certainly was a very hot day yesterday with many more to come so both Glena dn I decided that we should go fishing as soon as we close the store. Since it wasn't really a planned fishing outing we decided to target some largemouth with top water lures and then fish for some walleyes with erie rigs and hard baits. The evening was quite peaceful and the fish were co-operating.  Here are a couple of the bass that hit the top water lures.     Glen with one of his many bass.   A couple of small walleyes.       Last bite of the night was a sunfish.   It was a great evening of relaxing and fishing, with everything released.  Best regards, Sam
Sam, Thanks for the report! Nice to see that Erie Dearies are still working... and working well!  Gerritt.
Looks like a nice evening!  Sunset was beautiful and fish!   I always forget to try my earie dearie......need to remember that one!   Thanks Sam!
Looked like a great night to be out there fishing and relaxing Sam  Joey
Thanks for the report, Sam. Might see you next week if you're around.
Ah the erie dearie, one of my fav. musky lures.  Great report
Sam went fishing!!! Glad to see you getting out bud.  All work and no play makes Sam a dull boy  How is business out that way? Hoping to see you in the Fall!  Tony
What a perfect way to close out a day.   Great pitures Sam.
Nice Sam... good to get out and about...
WTG what a nice way to spend the eve. That there sunfish is a beauty sized Bluegill, would have been a nice snack too. Good on ya fur gettin out to enjoy the day.
Geez Sam, you fish???   Glad to see you getting out and relaxing a bit...great pictures...hope all is well  Maureen

Yes I do fish, it just happens that I have been far too tied up in business that I have not made time to fish. I will be away fishing all day on August 5th hoping to add a largemouth bass to our team stats, I will be taking Glen up to a lake that is private and the last time I was there the bass were huge. Next week I will give that salmon fishing another go at it and take Laurie out both salmon fishing and then bass fishing.  Well that is all for now until the next report.  Best regards, Sam
Sam...great report!  Good to see you got out for a change.  I've never top water fished...sounds exciting.  Some real nice pics too...esp the sunset ones.
awesome report must be crazy watching them smash those topwaters
